title: 怎么用命令方块怎么生成僵尸？
author: CHANG_dada
txt_content: 怎么生成 僵尸.爬行者.蠹虫.骷髅.女巫.怎么用suu指令生成？

replies.author: 熊镔
熊镔
replies.txt_content:
熊镔 发表于 2016-6-9 14:00
summon Zombie/Creeper/Skeleton/Witch
summon 生物id x y z
生物id见http://minecraft-ids.grahamedgecombe.com/entities

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
生物实体ID：http://minecraft-ids.grahamedgecombe.com/entities
僵尸：/summon Zombie ~ ~ ~
爬行者：/summon Creeper ~ ~ ~
蠹虫：/summon Silverfish ~ ~ ~
骷髅：/summon Skeleton ~ ~ ~
女巫：/summon Witch ~ ~ ~
